A4.text: In 1839, he received a military fellowship... to study medicine at the Friedrich Wilhelm University in Berlin (now Humboldt University of Berlin).

A5.text: But shortly after, he joined the Charité Hospital in Berlin for internship.

A6.text: Famous researchers, such as [...] Rudolf Virchow, and Robert Koch, contributed to Berlin University's scientific fame.
